entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as someone who was fussing about Harry before the feast. She insisted on giving him one last check-up.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as arriving at the feast and making a speech.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as walking into the Great Hall and trying to ignore the attention from others.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as sitting next to Harry at the Gryffindor table.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as sitting next to Ron and Harry at the Gryffindor table.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as winning the House Cup for the seventh year in a row. The Great Hall was decorated with Slytherin colours and had a banner showing the Slytherin serpent.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as having a table at the feast where Harry sat.

relationships.description: Dumbledore addressed Harry during his speech.
Madam Pomfrey treated Harry with a check-up before the feast.
